snippet: The conglomerate is not cutting enough costs to justify a $13.6 billion pounce for Pall. But the decision to voluntarily split Danaher in two dangles the prospect of better value for shareholders.
lead_paragraph: The conglomerate is not cutting enough costs to justify a $13.6 billion pounce for Pall. But the decision to voluntarily split Danaher in two dangles the prospect of better value for shareholders.

headline.print_headline: Danaher’s Breakup Plan Soothes Pinch of Big Acquisition
headline.main: Danaher’s Breakup Plan Eases Sting of Big Acquisition
